snippet: Representative Jesse L. Jackson Jr. has suffered blows to his image, including an absence his office explained by saying he was in treatment for “a mood disorder.”
abstract: Democratic Rep Jesse L Jackson Jr of Illinois has suffered blows to his image since 2008, including a recent extended absence that his office says is because of a treatment for a mood disorder;” disclosure, without many details, has set off speculation about the precise nature of his ailment, his location and, before his presumed re-election to Congress, his political future.
lead_paragraph: Representative Jesse L. Jackson Jr. has suffered blows to his image, including an absence his office explained by saying he was in treatment for “a mood disorder.”

headline.seo: Jesse Jackson Jr.’s Soaring Political Career Takes Uncertain Turn
headline.main: For a Soaring Political Career, Uncertain Turns
headline.print_headline: For a Soaring Political Career, Uncertain Turns
